channel.title: Recommend me a good HL/2 mod
channel.description: So, I've grown tired of all the games I've been playing and decided to play a few good Half-Life/Half-Life 2 mods. Problem is, I can't find any good ones and hoped some of you could help me find a few enjoyable mods. Thank you. ^_^

item.title: Recommend me a good HL/2 mod
item.dc:creator: blackout
item.description:
Nightmare house was brilliant. and also I like insurgency. it perfectly captures the blurry inclarity of a real combat situation.

just to clarify, I’ve never actually been in combat

or played very many Half life 2 mods for that matter.

I should probably be quiet

Read full topic

Operation Black Mesa
Underhell
Short Stories: Human Error, Water

item.title: Recommend me a good HL/2 mod
item.dc:creator: beejoo
item.description:
Insurgency- you can download it straight off Steam although I don’t know how big the player base is any more.

1187 is fun, and one of the guys who worked on it is also making The Mortewood Plaza on his own. It’s not out yet but it’s looking good.

item.source: Recommend me a good HL/2 mod

item.title: Recommend me a good HL/2 mod
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
The vast majority of mods suck. Even the best of them are only ‘ok’ games that you pretty much forget about shortly after playing. The Stanley Parable is probably the only one from the past few years that I liked & it didn’t really even have any combat or puzzles, it was just a short & quirky narrative thing. Better than Dear Esther in my opinion, even if it is a lot shorter.

Read full topic
item.source: Recommend me a good HL/2 mod

Read full topic
item.source: Recommend me a good HL/2 mod

item.title: Recommend me a good HL/2 mod
item.dc:creator: Devon136
item.description:
Nightmare House 2, greatest mod ive ever played, scariest too, great game, incredibly low replayability though, unless you get your friends to play it like i did, funniest shit ever. oh and garrys mod is well worth 10 bucks if you havent gotten it. SMOD is good too, its half life 2 but with some crazy shit added in, fun to fuck around with, especially with cheats.

Read full topic
item.source: Recommend me a good HL/2 mod

item.title: Recommend me a good HL/2 mod
item.dc:creator: Jack_Freeman
item.description:
geekofalltrades:

Half-Life:
Point of View
Affliction
Black Ops
Poke646
Poke646: Vendetta
Peaces Like Us
They Hunger

Half-Life 2 (+eps):
Union
Mission Improbable
MINERVA: Metastasis (play this mod, for the love of all that is holy)
Research and Development
Mistake of Pythagoras (fucking coolest mod ever, in my personal opinion)

Also, for Half-Life series mods, check out https://www.planetphillip.com.

Bear in mind that a lot of older HL2 mods were broken by a Steam update a year or two back; to get them working, you can consult this thread over on Steampowered and try some of the fixes they have listed.

Thanks, That’ll definetly be worth looking at.

Read full topic

item.title: Recommend me a good HL/2 mod
item.dc:creator: OrderOfDagon
item.description:
I’m on the look out too.

Right now, Dear Esther is coming out – I believe the 10th of this month.
That’s definitely worth looking into.

There is also Zombie Panic: Source, Age of Chivalry, and Garry’s mod.

If you’re looking for mods based around the world of Half Life 2 only, well then there is Synergy, Minerva, Opposing Force 2, Ravenholm, Combine Destiny, and there is this little mod that I eagerly await for; https://www.moddb.com/mods/source-rebels/images/sr-d1-city32-02-wallpaper#imagebox – it’s called Source: Rebels

Read full topic
